Name: FOREST OF ELF
About the game: ◆ Story Elven village in a deep forest One day suddenly, the whole of the forest was covered with a dark border. Among them, there are evil monsters attacking villagers one after another. It is a girl who has finished training and came back. Soon after seeing the misery she is immersed in the sentiments of her return home. Throwing in a fight to save the forest The nature of the disaster to wait for is full .... ◆ Game content This is a stage clear action RPG game that fights with bows and arrows and powerful magic. Break through the WAVE set for each stage, and defeat the bosses who are waiting. From beginners to advanced users, who are not good at access, with a level-up system, It will be enjoyed by a wide range of people. After clearing, you can play with the high difficulty level 'Bosslash mode'. ◆ Operation [Keyboard correspondence] Move key: ↑, ↓, ←, → Bow Attack: Shift, Space Skill Attack (Home Magic): C Barrier magic: X Maximum magic: Z Execution key (skipping in scenario): input 【Support for game pad】
